name: 王金樹
objective:
Ch1 :Introduction 
Ch2: Substance
Ch3: Close system energy equation
Ch4: Open system energy

Ch6: Open system 2nd law
Ch7 Clausius inequality and Irreversity
Ch8  Application
schedule:

Ch2: Substance (4hr) 6:30,7_2

Ch4: Open system energy (6hr) 6_26,6_27

Ch7 Clausius inequality and Irreversity (4hr) 7_14,7_15
Ch8  Application 3_17,2_17,2_24,5_5,5_12

期中 30%
期 末 50%
平時 20%
materials: 熱力學 Borgnakke's  Fundamentals of Thermodynamics
